ja: 暗号化キーの型が不正です：{}。使用可能なタイプは【None】・【str】・【tuple[Callable]】。Tupleの場合は【暗号化関数、複合化関数】の順番が必用
en: {} has been provided but only types str, None and tuple[Callable] can be used as encryption keys. In case of tuple, the first callable should handle encryption, with the second handling decrpytion
